title: Wednesday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
ALT★HERO Episode 29: The Spider Burns

SAVAGE MEMES Episode 41: Meta Beta

CHATEAU GRIEF Episode 14: Think of the Posse Abilities

THE HAMMER OF FREEDOM Episode 30: You Know What To Do

This episode of ALT★HERO marks the first new series content since Issue 7 was complete with Episode 7. Episode 29 and the next 5-6 episodes, comprise ALT★HERO Issue 8, which features the well-known illustrator Ediano Silva. Once Issues 7-12 are complete, they will go to print and the omnibuses will be sent out to the backers.
